department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Animating Science
course.meeting_text: Tu., 1-5, and weekly film screenings F., 1-3
course.faculty_text: Ruth S. Lingford and Alain Viel
course.description: This hands-on class will investigate the cross-overs between science and animation. How can animation communicate abstract ideas? How can science inspire the artist? Students will acquire some fundamental animation skills, and will work on individual and group projects. This class will be suitable for students with an interest either in science or visual art, or both.
course.notes: //This course has an additional weekly film screening, Fridays, 1-3 pm.
